Real Madrid: the 5 eleven possible for Zidane




Zinedine Zidane clarified her position on Gareth Bale in a press conference on Tuesday. The Merengue coach wants to keep in his squad the Welsh right wing.




Zidane evokes the Bale case




Zinedine Zidane + 6 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

In a press conference on Tuesday, Zinedine Zidane spoke about the uncomfortable situation of Gareth Bale. The French coach wants "Bale stay until the end of the season". He added, "People think I want to see him go, it's nonsense."
Currently injured, the Welsh should yet join the selection led by Ryan Giggs in a few days. Which makes cringe a few teeth among supporters of the Real.
Zidane assured that he understood Giggs' decision to retain his star for the next rally for the Euro 2020 qualifying phases. Finally, Zidane has certified that he has "good relations" with Gareth Bale.
